home.title: You are not alone
home.lead: CyberShield is a secure, private tool designed to empower you in the face of online harassment. We provide a survivor-centered space to take control of your experience.
home.cta_start: Start Documenting ‚Äî Take the first step
home.attack_help: Click any shield to reveal a quick definition, examples, and immediate tips.

card1.title: Private & Secure Documentation
card1.desc: Your safety is our priority. Document incidents in your own words‚Äîwith or without evidence‚Äîin a completely confidential space.

card2.title: Personalized Action Guidance
card2.desc: Receive clear, practical steps tailored to your specific situation and platform.

card3.title: Control Your Records
card3.desc: Choose to download a one-time PDF or save encrypted records to your device.

find_match.title: Find Your Match
find_match.help: Not sure what happened? Below are short example scenarios ‚Äî these are illustrative examples rather than primary action buttons. Tap any example to start documenting.

cyber_flashing.title: Cyber Flashing
cyber_flashing.short: Unsolicited explicit images/videos sent to you
causes: Direct messages from unknown accounts
Shared to group chats without consent
Someone posts an image tagging you

digital_voyeurism.title: Digital Voyeurism
causes: Hidden camera or livestream capture
Screenshots taken during private calls
Recordings shared to others without consent

morphing_transmogrification.title: Morphing
morphing_transmogrification.short: Your photo edited into explicit content
causes: Image taken and edited by a third party
AI tools used to place your likeness into new content
Someone reposts an altered image claiming it is you

non_consenting_dissemination.title: Non-Consensual Dissemination
causes: A former partner shares private images
Hacked account leads to leaks
Someone downloads and reposts content without permission

sexploitation.title: Sexploitation
sexploitation.short: Coercing sexual acts or content through manipulation
causes: Pressure or manipulation to perform sexual acts
Blackmail to force content creation
Threats or emotional coercion to obtain images

cyber_stalking.title: Cyber Stalking
causes: Repeated messages or comments across platforms
Using location tags or photos to follow movements
Creating false profiles to monitor you

doxing.title: Doxing
doxing.short: Publishing private info to harm you
causes: Someone compiles public records and shares them
Posting screenshots with personal details
Leaking private conversations that include identifying info

gender_based_hate_speech.title: Gender-Based Hate Speech
gender_based_hate_speech.short: Targeted abuse because of your gender
causes: Comments targeting gender identity on public posts
Coordinated harassment campaigns focused on gender
Using slurs or threats in replies and DMs

online_sexual_harassment_bullying.title: Online Sexual Harassment
causes: Repeated unsolicited sexual messages
Sexual comments on your public posts
Persistent requests or pressure in chat

online_threats_blackmail.title: Online Threats & Blackmail
causes: Threats to release content unless you comply
Direct messages demanding money or actions
Public posts threatening exposure

sextortion.title: Sextortion
sextortion.short: Pay or I will expose your intimate images
causes: Someone threatens to share intimate content unless paid
Hacked accounts used to harvest compromising material
Scammers posing as lovers to extract media

identity_theft_impersonation.title: Impersonation
causes: Fake profiles created in your name
Using your photos to set up accounts
Messages sent to others pretending to be you

online_grooming.title: Online Grooming
causes: Gradual relationship-building to lower defenses
Soliciting photos or private contact over time
Encouraging secret conversations away from parents/caregivers

zoom_bombing.title: Zoom Bombing
zoom_bombing.short: Intruding calls to harass with hate/obscenity
causes: Uninvited participants join public meetings
Meeting links shared publicly or in insecure places
Screen-sharing abusive content during calls

document.title: Document the Experience
document.welcome: You're doing an important thing ‚Äî documenting details helps you preserve an accurate record. Only include what you feel safe sharing.
document.q1_help: Include dates, times, usernames, and exact messages where possible.
document.q2_label: 2. Type of online abuse (Select all that apply)
document.q4_help: You are not required to upload anything. Text documentation is valid. If you do upload, keep copies in a secure place.

review.title: Review Your Documentation
review.subtitle: Here's what you're about to save or export. Make sure everything looks right.

saved.title: Record Saved Successfully!
saved.message: Your documentation has been encrypted and saved to your browser. You can find it anytime in the My Records page.
saved.from_edit: Edit ‚Äî Make changes to your documentation
saved.from_export: Export PDF ‚Äî Download a copy to share or keep safe
saved.from_delete: Delete ‚Äî Remove the record if you no longer need it
